scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Brande
scrape.text: I don't even know what to say about this book. It has a very naughty, dirty feeling to it. It sneaks up and bites you in the ass just as your are trying to figure out why you keep reading it. I just finished it and I think I need to go to church. Gives you the "moral" creeps....Great book!
